On this page

agentapi++ ​

agentapi++ is a Go HTTP API server that controls coding agents through terminal emulation.

Start ​

  • Read README.md for runtime and architecture overview.
  • Use this docsite for role-oriented usage and operations docs.

Documentation IA ​

  • Tutorials: guided examples
  • How-to: task-based instructions
  • Explanation: architecture and design rationale
  • Operations: runbooks and release operations
  • API: endpoint behavior and contract notes
